extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and checking if the pppd daemon is activated.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability (firmware < 16 and pppd daemon activated)?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device to firmware version 16 or higher to mitigate the vulnerability.
